electricity_price.name: Electricity price total
electricity_price.state: Total consumption price per kWh from Tibber API (spot + all costs incl. VAT). Use this for consumption decisions.

electricity_price_excl.name: Electricity price excl tax (calculated)
electricity_price_excl.state: Price with surcharge but excluding tax, derived from base price

electricity_price_excl_cent.name: Electricity price excl tax in cents (calculated)
electricity_price_excl_cent.state: Same as electricity_price_excl but converted to cents

electricity_price_calc.name: Electricity price total (calculated)
electricity_price_calc.state: Total price calculated as (energy + surcharge + tax) * tax_rate

hour_cheapest_top.name: Price rank in day (0-1)
hour_cheapest_top.state: Current hour's price rank from 0 (cheapest) to 1 (most expensive) for all hours today

hour_cheapest_top_after_0000.name: Night price rank (0-1)
hour_cheapest_top_after_0000.state: Price rank 0-1 comparing current hour to 00:00-08:00 period

hour_cheapest_top_after_0800.name: Day price rank (0-1)
hour_cheapest_top_after_0800.state: Price rank 0-1 comparing current hour to 08:00-18:00 period

hour_cheapest_top_after_1800.name: Evening price rank (0-1)
hour_cheapest_top_after_1800.state: Price rank 0-1 comparing current hour to 18:00-00:00 period

electricity_price_purchasing_compensatio.name: Purchasing compensation excl VAT (configured)
electricity_price_purchasing_compensatio.state: Tibber inkoopvergoeding configured in integration options, excluding VAT

electricity_price_hist.name: Base energy price (historical)
electricity_price_hist.state: Base price excluding all surcharges and tax

electricity_price_excl_base.name: Base energy price without surcharge
electricity_price_excl_base.state: Nord Pool spot price from Tibber API (energy field). Use this for feed-in decisions (can be negative).

electricity_price_energy_tax_excl.name: Energy tax excl VAT (configured)
electricity_price_energy_tax_excl.state: Fixed energy tax configured in integration options

electricity_price_today_min.name: Today minimum price
electricity_price_today_min.state: Lowest electricity price for today (total incl. VAT)

electricity_price_today_max.name: Today maximum price
electricity_price_today_max.state: Highest electricity price for today (total incl. VAT)

electricity_price_today_avg.name: Today average price
electricity_price_today_avg.state: Average electricity price for today (total incl. VAT)

electricity_price_tomorrow_min.name: Tomorrow minimum price
electricity_price_tomorrow_min.state: Lowest electricity price for tomorrow (total incl. VAT)

electricity_price_tomorrow_max.name: Tomorrow maximum price
electricity_price_tomorrow_max.state: Highest electricity price for tomorrow (total incl. VAT)

electricity_price_tomorrow_avg.name: Tomorrow average price
electricity_price_tomorrow_avg.state: Average electricity price for tomorrow (total incl. VAT)

electricity_spotprice_today_min.name: Today minimum spotprice
electricity_spotprice_today_min.state: Lowest spotprice for today (excl. surcharges, for solar feed-in)

electricity_spotprice_today_max.name: Today maximum spotprice
electricity_spotprice_today_max.state: Highest spotprice for today (excl. surcharges, for solar feed-in)

electricity_spotprice_today_avg.name: Today average spotprice
electricity_spotprice_today_avg.state: Average spotprice for today (excl. surcharges, for solar feed-in)

electricity_spotprice_tomorrow_min.name: Tomorrow minimum spotprice
electricity_spotprice_tomorrow_min.state: Lowest spotprice for tomorrow (excl. surcharges, for solar feed-in)

electricity_spotprice_tomorrow_max.name: Tomorrow maximum spotprice
electricity_spotprice_tomorrow_max.state: Highest spotprice for tomorrow (excl. surcharges, for solar feed-in)

electricity_spotprice_tomorrow_avg.name: Tomorrow average spotprice
electricity_spotprice_tomorrow_avg.state: Average spotprice for tomorrow (excl. surcharges, for solar feed-in)
